row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
row.description: Build Java arguments using specified array.

row.process: : SET &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = "" :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[],SIZE) :SET &IDX# = 1 :WHILE &IDX# LE &LEN# : SET &TEMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[&IDX#],"""","\""") : SET &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, """ ") : SET &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, &TEMP#) : SET &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " "" ") :SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 :ENDWHILE
